name: Fear of the Sea
description:
This is a very small game where you have to drive your boat around the sea collecting treasure and avoiding dangers.

This game was made for Jamoween 3: Children of the Jam which had the theme "Your Worst Fears and Nightmares"

This game is based on the fact that the sea is a horror dimension and nobody should ever go near it.

Also, this is definitely how boats work.

All assets from external sources.
